subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: A missed Xavier free throw opened the door for Ohio State to push the game into overtime, where the Buckeyes managed to earn a hard-fought N.C.A.A. tournament victory.
snippet: A missed Xavier free throw opened the door for Ohio State to push the game into overtime, where the Buckeyes managed to earn a hard-fought N.C.A.A. tournament victory.
